shopifyCollection.title: Banners
shopifyCollection.description: Large format four- and five-sided banners, also known as Championship Banners. Our original, collaboration and vintage-inspired designs with stitched felt-on-felt graphics.
shopifyCollection.descriptionHtml: Large format four- and five-sided banners, also known as Championship Banners. Our original, collaboration and vintage-inspired designs with stitched felt-on-felt graphics.

products.title: Alphabet Banner
products.description: Elemen-O-P! Learn the alphabet with a little help from Oxford Pennant. You pick the letters, we'll put the heart. Size: 49 " x 6" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt Color: Black body, Gold, White, and Red details Size cannot be changed. Turnaround time is 14-18 business days. All sales on custom pieces are final.
products.descriptionHtml:
Elemen-O-P! Learn the alphabet with a little help from Oxford Pennant. You pick the letters, we'll put the heart. 

Size: 49 " x 6" 

Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt

Color: Black body, Gold, White, and Red details

Size cannot be changed. Turnaround time is 14-18 business days. All sales on custom pieces are final.

products.title: Walk-Ins Welcome Championship Banner
products.description: td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;} For people who like making new buds. This banner is part of our Shopkeepers Collection, inspired by our friends in the tattoo and service industry. Perfect for bars, restaurants, hair salons and tattoo parlors. Size: 6' x 1' Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt, and stitched design Color: Pink body, Black details
products.descriptionHtml:
For people who like making new buds.

This banner is part of our Shopkeepers Collection, inspired by our friends in the tattoo and service industry. Perfect for bars, restaurants, hair salons and tattoo parlors.

Size: 6' x 1'

Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt, and stitched design

Color: Pink body, Black details

products.title: Bold Will Hold Championship Banner
products.description: td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;} This item is made-to-order and will take roughly 2-3 weeks to produce before shipping. Tracking information will be sent once order is fulfilled. The classics never fade. This banner is part of our Shopkeepers Collection, inspired by our friends in the tattoo and service industry. products.title: Do Right And Fear No Man Championship Banner
products.description: Inspired by our friends at Old Souls in Cold Spring, NY who found photograph of that phrase and passed it along for us to interpret. This design is also available as a pennant, camp flag, and patch. Size: 6' x 1' Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt, and stitched design Color: Black body, Cream and Gold details
products.descriptionHtml:
Inspired by our friends at Old Souls in Cold Spring, NY who found photograph of that phrase and passed it along for us to interpret. 

This design is also available as a pennant, camp flag, and patch.  

Size: 6' x 1'

Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt, and stitched design

Color: Black body, Cream and Gold details

products.title: Custom Hometown Banner
products.description: Our hometown banners, but this one has your hometown’s name on it. Check out the whole collection to see which hometowns we already have made up! Note seeing the colorways you want? Check out our custom dog name banner for other options! Size: 28 " x 6" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt Color: Pick from our options above Please note: our ability to customize colors is limited to the options above. Size cannot be changed. Max 12 characters. Turnaround time is 14-18 business days. All sales on custom pieces are final.

Check out the whole collection to see which hometowns we already have made up!

Please note: our ability to customize colors is limited to the options above. Size cannot be changed. Max 12 characters. Turnaround time is 14-18 business days. All sales on custom pieces are final.

products.title: Yes You Can Rainbow Championship Banner • Kelle Hampton x Oxford Pennant Original
products.description: This item is part of a collaboration with Kelle Hampton, a New York Times Bestselling Author. Kelle’s book, Bloom, is a story about her relationship with her daughter Nella, who was born with Down syndrome. A portion of all proceeds benefit Ruby’s Rainbow, a charity who supports adults with Down syndrome seeking higher education. Size: 24" x 30" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt, and stitched design Color: White
products.descriptionHtml:
This item is part of a collaboration with Kelle Hampton, a New York Times Bestselling Author. Kelle’s book, Bloom, is a story about her relationship with her daughter Nella, who was born with Down syndrome.  A portion of all proceeds benefit Ruby’s Rainbow, a charity who supports adults with Down syndrome seeking higher education.

Color: White
